channel.title: Interview on Vibhas Goyal
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on Vibhas Goyal

item.title: Samsung R&D Bangalore Interview Experience
item.description: Samsung really was the worst interview experience. One day, I suddenly get a call from a recruiter based on my profile from Naukri.com On the call, the recruiter basically just asked me directly when I would like to have the interview. I was initially impressed that they decided to move it fast but this feeling did not last long.. Immediately I got an invite for the interview. I looked at it.
